sentences.en: A fool may give a wise man counsel.
sentences.cn: 愚者千虑,必有一得.

sentences.en: Deliberate in counsel , prompt in action.
sentences.cn: 静如处子,动如脱兔.

sentences.en: Guscott rarely speaks out, preferring to keep his own counsel.
sentences.cn: 古斯科特很少发表意见，他更喜欢把自己的看法埋在心里。

sentences.en: He assisted me with good counsel and encouragement.
sentences.cn: 他以良好的忠告和鼓励帮助我

sentences.en: He had always been able to count on her wise counsel.
sentences.cn: 他总是能够指望她明智的忠告。

sentences.en: He refused to listen to the old man's counsel.
sentences.cn: 他拒不听从老人的忠告.

sentences.en: He shows keen interest in his friends, hearing out their problems and offering counsel.
sentences.cn: 他对自己的朋友表现出极大的关注，聆听他们的难题并提出忠告。

sentences.en: His parishioners sought his counsel and loved him.
sentences.cn: 教区居民征询他的建议并且爱戴着他。

sentences.en: I would counsel caution in such a case.
sentences.cn: 我奉劝在此情况下务必小心.

sentences.en: I'll keep my own counsel whatever they like to say about the matter.
sentences.cn: 不管他们对这一问题说什么,我都将保守秘密.

sentences.en: Is this fair? Well, I put that question today to Deputy Counsel Craig Gillen.
sentences.cn: 这公平吗？我今天向副顾问克雷格·吉伦提出这个问题。

sentences.en: It is wise to seek help and counsel as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 尽快寻求帮助和建议乃明智之举。

sentences.en: Listen to the counsel of your elders.
sentences.cn: 听从长辈们的劝告吧.

sentences.en: Mr. A was counsel for the plaintiff, and Mr. B for the defendant.
sentences.cn: A先生作原告的辩护人, B先生作被告的辩护人.

sentences.en: My advisers counselled me to do nothing.
sentences.cn: 我的顾问建议我不要做任何事情。

sentences.en: she doubted what he said but kept her own counsel.
sentences.cn: 她对他的话感到疑惑，但却不说出来。

sentences.en: The judge asked counsel for the defence to explain his point.
sentences.cn: 法官请示法律顾问允许被告说明细节.

sentences.en: The judge asked counsel for the defence to explain.
sentences.cn: 法官要求被告的辩护律师作出解释。

sentences.en: the party leader and chairman took counsel together.
sentences.cn: 政党领导和主席共同商讨问题。

sentences.en: Their free guidance and counsel will be the most priceless gift you can receive.
sentences.cn: 他们的免费指导和忠告，将是你能够收到的最无价的礼物。

sentences.en: Those who counsel US privately, point out that we are wrong, are true friends.
sentences.cn: 那些私下忠告我们，指出我们错误的人，才是真正的朋友。

sentences.en: Yet this book is not a counsel of despair.
sentences.cn: 然而这本书里并非全是让人失望的忠告。
